content: *winner of the 2019 stik x lion brand pattern contest 1 * easy beginner pattern makes super soft and fluffy slippers in no time with just one ball of lion brand wool-ease thick & quick or equivalent super bulky yarn you can make any of the four sizes women s small 5-7 women s medium 8-10 men s medium 8-10 men s large 11-13 gauge 8 sts x 16 row = 4 in garter stitch knitting every row only knit purl cast on and cast off stitches are used each slipper is made in one piece folded in half and seamed from toe to heel ______________________________________ **traduit en français par louise robert design 2 ** ______________________________________ **μετάφραση στα ελληνικά από γιάννα γιαννουρή** ______________________________________ **tradotto in italiano da barbara medetti ravelry mercante /people/mercante ** ______________________________________ 1 https //shitthatiknit com/pages/knit-kits 2 https //www ravelry com/people/louiserdesign
